verses.name: Micah 1:12
verses.text: For the inhabitant of Maroth waited carefully for good: but evil came down from the Lord unto the gate of Jerusalem.

verses.name: Micah 1:13
verses.text: O thou inhabitant of Lachish, bind the chariot to the swift beast: she is the beginning of the sin to the daughter of Zion: for the transgressions of Israel were found in thee.

verses.name: Micah 1:14
verses.text: Therefore shalt thou give presents to Moresheth–gath: the houses of Achzib shall be a lie to the kings of Israel.

verses.name: Micah 1:15
verses.text: Yet will I bring an heir unto thee, O inhabitant of Mareshah: he shall come unto Adullam the glory of Israel.
